entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this morning. Showers beginning near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning then light late this afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
